title: Modern and awesome 3 bed, 3 bath home in Newbold!
description:
1413 S Chadwick Street -- Situated on a quiet street in Newbold, this unique newer construction home has been tastefully updated and meticulously maintained by the current owners. Consisting of just over 2,300 square feet of living space, with 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, a finished basement, 2 outdoor spaces and various custom upgrades, this home cannot be overlooked. When you enter you immediately notice the wide plank Pine hardwood floors and custom moldings that are featured throughout the home. The open layout, eastern and western exposures, recessed lighting, and large windows provide a bright and airy feel. The spacious living room with built in coat and shoe storage leads into the dining area that comfortably fits a large table. Continue into the beautiful kitchen with white shaker cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, upgraded hardware and fixtures, subway tiled backsplash, and a custom-built island with a quartz waterfall countertop, wine fridge and additional storage and seating. This kitchen features an optimal layout that’s great for entertaining and has an abundance of storage. Off the kitchen is the first of two private outdoor spaces, perfect for outdoor dining and relaxing. The 2nd floor consists of two spacious bedrooms with custom built-in closets, a full bath with a tub and a conveniently located laundry closet with storage and a folding station. The primary suite is a private oasis spanning the entire third floor. The bedroom comfortably fits a king bed, with plenty of room for additional furniture. Although, the custom fitted Closets by Design walk-in closet will never leave you with a lack of storage space. The spa-like primary bath features sleek black and white tile, dual sinks, a large stall shower with three shower heads, and a separate tub. Head up the stairs to find the large roofdeck featuring 360-degree views of the city, custom composite wood decking, gas line for a grill, water spicket and electric. The home also features a finished basement with a full bath and Schluter®-DITRA-HEAT Radiant heated flooring with porcelain tile, perfect for a second living space, gym, home office or guest room. Automatic shutoff valve installed on waterline with water sensors throughout house and a custom medal tray in the laundry area. Dual zone HVAC with two Nest thermostats, built-in speaker system in the living room, and new window treatments throughout. Great central location, quick walk to Passyunk Ave, Sprouts, Target, American Sardine Bar, and more. Easy access to various bus lines and the Broad Street line. Available December 1st. Dogs okay, sorry no cats. 1st, last, and 1 month security due when lease is signed.
Please reply by email with any questions, or to schedule a showing.
Jeff “City” Block

Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Concierge, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, L'Occitane, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Spice Finch, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Restaurant Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Grab a French baguette or slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Relax in the Wintergarden at Dilworth Park. There is so much to do in this neighborhood!

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Yoga Studio, Sauna
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Veda, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Bluestone Lane, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Le Pain Quotidien. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a mani/pedi at Philly Nails Bar. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: One-of-a-kind Dramatic Sun-filled Home With Towering Ceilings
description:
One-of-a-kind dramatic sun-filled home with towering ceilings, exposed brick and covered garage parking on a virtually hidden block in the historic Society Hill section of Philadelphia. This home features three levels of living with a massive living room, half bath, dining room and full kitchen conveniently located on the first floor. Following the exposed brick and sun drenched stairs up to the second level opens you to your first two bedrooms, laundry, and first full bathroom. Your master is revealed to you after a long private corridor greeting you with his and hers full bathroom with walk-in closet and tremendous shower room. The third floor features a romantic full floor fourth bedroom option with exposed beams and unprecedented privacy. Those of you who enjoy walkability, shops and a nightlife you can leave at the club will love the accessibility this home offers. Being footsteps away from some of the best restaurants, cafes and farmers markets this home allows you to enjoy the finer things the city has to offer. Highlights of the neighborhood include, The Twisted Tail, Bloomsday Café, Bistro Romano. In the mood for something else? Cherry street pier, Spruce Street Harbor park and Liberty point are only a 15 minute walk. Experience 114 Naudain in person and set up your tour today! Unit is part of an HOA which is included in monthly rent.

title: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease!
description:
Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. This is a rare rental in a perfect location. **Owner would like to keep the back parking spot for his wood work space but could be leased for an additional $200 per month. Home can be rented furnished for an additional $200 per month.

description:
The studio apartment home at 2107 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at the best restaurants! Nearby dining options include Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Monk's Cafe, Friday Saturday Sunday, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Savor warm cookies right out of the oven at Insomnia Cookies. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a part of history
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: Welcome to the carriage house of Hamilton Hall !!
description:
Welcome to the carriage house of Hamilton Hall Ballroom lofts in Historic Old City. One of kind home tucked away from the bustle of the city on a cobblestone street. This boutique home is on the first floor of a 5 unit condo building with elevator. This home just underwent a stunning renovation throughout with no detail overlooked. Enter into main lobby area or through your own private entrance door by the 1 car parking garage with plenty of storage area and a garage door opener. You can have 2 car parking by parking in front of your own garage with parking painted parking square. Wide open floor plan with original Corinthian columns and 9+ ceilings. New white oak engineered hardwood floors with custom designer painted walls and trim. Oversized windows throughout and new wall sconces and high-hats for plenty of lighting. Kitchen custom designed with white luxury cabinetry w/ detailed handle hardware and gorgeous Quartz counters. Glazed 4 X 8 subway tile. Center island with seating for 3 more people to share in dining. Oversized living room for fun entertaining. Great space for watching the game or playing games. Master bedroom has plenty of windows and a new ceiling fan. Bathroom is detailed in glazed herringbone tile design with a new glass shower enclosure. Gray double vanity sinks with stately designed vanities. Walk in rainfall shower area with deluxe shower fixtures. Second bedroom has a ceiling fan and private 8X85 side yard with fenced bamboo for privacy. Walk score of 98 to great boutique stores, fabulous restaurants, Penns Landing waterfront, Franklin Park, Cherry Pier, Independence Hall, Constitution Center, Revolution Museum and so much more. Pets are allowed:)

title: 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of restaurants, cafes and bars. You'll be steps from the Lombard-South Station for the Broad Street Line, plus surrounded by public transportation bus routes. Walkable to the Marian Anderson Recreation Center and Rittenhouse Square. Check out neighborhood hotspots like Bob & Barbara's Lounge, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, Loco Pez, Tio Flores, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and monthly pet rent of $30/month for dogs and $25/month for cats). There is a maximum weight of 30lbs for dogs. Tenants responsible for: upfront payments of $125 for common area electricity + $395 for water. Tenants are also required to put PECO + wifi/cable in their name. (If a longer lease is secured, prepayments will be adjusted). Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Massive 3 Bed 2 Bath Nyc Style Loft in the Heart of Northern Liberties
description:
Welcome to this massive 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, NYC style loft in the heart of Northern Liberties! This loft boasts over 1,850+ square feet of space in addition to the soaring 20+ feet high ceilings, with a private outdoor patio. Door to door service with the 1-car garage parking spot right outside the back door. Step inside to the open concept living and entertaining area complete with a sunken chef’s style kitchen and full breakfast bar. The large private primary bedroom on the main floor is complete with plenty of closet space. Recently renovated, you’ll love the brand new primary bathroom with glass enclosed waterfall shower and dual vanity sinks. Two flex spaces (the second living area + the sitting room) can be found in the home. One of them could absolutely be converted into a true third bedroom, nursery, or fantastic home office! The second floor loft space works perfectly as a second bedroom or living room/office area; also complete with lots of closet space and an ensuite full bathroom. This loft is complete with a full laundry room, ample closets and storage space throughout. The entrance door alone is surrounded by three deep closets - perfect for all of your storage, coat closet, pantry, and linen closet needs. Located just steps away from Jerry’s Bar, Standard Tap, Dolce Caffe, 3J’s Deli and all that N. 2nd Street has to offer! Only blocks from all of your favorite Northern Liberties & Fishtown hot spots, plus public transportation and access to all of the major highways. title: Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Near Restaurants
description:
The studio apartment home at 507 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 5th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Paper Source, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Scotch & Soda, Bluemercury, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, CB2, H&M, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Tselaine, Banana Republic Factory, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at or have food delivered from Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Cleavers, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Friday Saturday Sunday, Monk's Cafe, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a cup of coffee at Ultimo, Elixr, Vibrant, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Konditori, Nook, K'Far, and La Colombe. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Sample the Rittenhouse Churro sundae from El Merkury. Pick up warm cookies from Insomnia Cookies. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom
description:
Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom and Oversized Windows located in the heart of the historic Old City! 315 Flats is an Elevator Building with a welcoming lobby featuring Marble Floors and an Intercom/Camera system for Additional Security. Upon entering unit 301, you're greeted by 10-foot ceilings and South-Facing Oversized Windows filling the living space with natural light. The kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances, a built-in Microwave and Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Modern Cabinetry, and an Island overlooking the living area. Hardwood Floors are throughout the living space and bedroom. The living room/dining room combo offers views of The historic Quaker Meeting House and plenty of room for entertaining. The Bathroom includes a Double Sink, a Tub/Shower combo, and Tiled floors. The in-unit Washer & Dryer are conveniently located in a dedicated closet. The 10-foot Ceilings and Oversized Windows continue in the spacious bedroom, which includes a Walk-In Closet and a modern shelving unit for additional storage. 315 Flats is situated in the heart of the neighborhood and steps from excellent restaurants, shops, Spruce Harbor Park, Independence Hall, Philadelphia's most historic sites, and all that Old City offers. Easy access to I-95, the Vine Street Expressway, and Ben Franklin Bridge. Schedule a private tour today! Garage parking options are located right around the corner.

title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.

description:
Available for move-in early November - This 1 bed, 1 bath condo WITH PRIVATE ROOF DECK and shared rear yard is waiting for you!!! Old world charm mixed with new modern finishes! Best lay-out in the building with 15 ft. high ceilings creating a spacious living area. Hardwood flooring through-out. Eat-in kitchen featuring quartz tops and stainless steel appliances. Large bedroom with large closet & custom storage space. Building features a private roof deck designated to the unit with unobstructed center city skyline views, a shared back yard on ground level and large storage closet in the basement included! ! Fantastic location - walking distance to center city, local restaurants and night life. Easy street parking. Residential quiet block but still close to the action! (note: bedroom color is now neutral - not blue!)
729 S 12th St #200
